About Me

A few things about me...

BIO

Hi, I'm Aaron. I am eager to learn about new technologies in web development and tech in general. I'm currently a web development student at Medieinstitutet and I love it. I also learn on my spare time through Youtube videos and Udemy.

Some of the most fun I have had is times we had group assignments, I have discovered that I enjoy working in group. I also like helping my peers whenever I can, so pair programming is something really enjoy.

One of my greatest strengths is that I am stubborn when it comes to solving a problem. I keep trying to solve a problem till it's solved.
